title: N172 Jim McCormick FS - SGC10 - nice image - no longer available
author: Angyale

posts.post_title: N172 Jim McCormick FS - SGC10 - nice image - no longer available
posts.post_content:
McCormick N172 with a much better than average image for this player. Card is an SGC 10 due to added glue and scrapbook residue.  No paper loss.  On the scarce list and a fighting chance to get into the HOF due to the recent efforts of a sportswriter.  Read: McCormickForTheHall.com. Better scans available upon request.  PM me with your email address. Thanks for looking.
Angyale
